results.title: Series and parallel circuits
results.brief_description: This film explains the relationship between resistance, current, and voltage in both series circuits and parallel circuits. The advantages and disadvantages of each type of circuit is vividly demonstrated; typical problems are presented; and a simple series-parallel combination is illustrated and explained.

results.title: Sergei Eisenstein 1898-1948
results.creator_credit: Moscow Central Studio of Documentary Films
results.brief_description: This film biography deals with the life and work of the classic Russian director, Sergei Mikhailovitch Eisenstein, 1989-1948. Extracts from some of his best known films including “Potemkin”, “Old and New”, “Ten Days that Shook the World” and “Ivan the Terrible”. Homage is paid to the director by Sergei Prokofiev, Gregori Alexandrov and Guiseppe de Santis.

results.title: Serenal
results.brief_description:
A vibrant fantasia of patterned sound in which Norman McLaren salutes the West Indies, painting the spirit of fiesta on film to the lively beat of an island tune by Trinidad’s Grand Curacaya Orchestra.
(Awards: San Sebastian; Bilbao; Bergamo.)

results.title: Sequences of behavior (TEFC)
results.brief_description:
Episode number 4 of Series “Behavior Theory in Practice”.
Shows procedure for conditioning homogeneous and heterogeneous behaviour chains. Demonstrates shaping of complex behaviour chains in pigeons, dogs in obedience trials, police dogs and guide dogs, showing practical application of laboratory findings

results.title: Sequel to Surtsey
results.brief_description: Shows the volcanic activity of the island of Surtsey near Iceland throughout 1965-l966. Submarine eruptions create the temporary neighbouring islands of Syrtlingur and Jolnir, reduced to shoals soon after they cease erupting. After a quiescent period new eruptions begin on Surtsey itself. Meanwhile scientific investigations continue, a permanent base is established and plant life appears. A continuation of the film Birth of an Island (502828).

results.title: September 11 news footage
results.brief_description: The world held its breath as two hijacked planes were crashed into the World Trade Center in New York City on 11 September 2001. TV networks around the world bore witness and millions of people saw the historic event unfold in real time.

results.title: Sept Jours Ailleurs
results.brief_description:
A chronicle of the life of a young couple, doubling as a realistic portrait of urban and social conditions in France on the eve of May 68

Credits: Director, Marin Karmitz ; writers, Marin Karmitz, Catherine Martin ; photography, Sylvain du Pasquier ; music, Jacky Moreau ; choreography, Dirk Sanders.
Cast: Jacques Higelin, Vivianne Chiffre, Sonia Filatof, Vladanka Langofer, Yvonne Mestre, Fabienne Pradal, Christine Reynolds.

results.title: Sentinel: the west face
results.creator_credit: Summit Films and Roger C. Brown
results.brief_description: A breath-taking record of two men scaling Sentinel Rock in Yosemite National Park. Also presents a verbal commentary on the practical “hows” of mountain-climbing and its philosophical “why”. All mountains are merely rocks, the film tells us and “a wall is simply the imagination’s refusal to cope with a rock so large. The rock is here and now. It asks total commitment. For most good climbers this was given years ago when a choice was required. Now it is automatic.” The ascent becomes no longer physical displacement from bottom to top, but a kind of ballet of human expression, “as individual as a name or a signature”.
results.description: A breath-taking record of two men scaling Sentinel Rock in Yosemite National Park.
